object.name: InlineQueryResultCachedSticker
object.description: Represents a link to a sticker stored on the Telegram servers. By default, this sticker will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the sticker.
object.html_description: Represents a link to a sticker stored on the Telegram servers. By default, this sticker will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the sticker.
object.rst_description: Represents a link to a sticker stored on the Telegram servers. By default, this sticker will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use *input_message_content* to send a message with the specified content instead of the sticker.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be sticker
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *sticker*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: A valid file identifier of the sticker
annotations.html_description: A valid file identifier of the sticker
annotations.rst_description: A valid file identifier of the sticker
annotations.name: sticker_file_id

annotations.description: Inline keyboard attached to the message
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Content of the message to be sent instead of the sticker
annotations.html_description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the sticker
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Content of the message to be sent instead of the sticker
annotations.name: input_message_content
